Attacks.Name: Thunderbolt
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Quick Attack
Attacks.Effect: This attack ignores line of sight.

Attacks.Name: Electro Ball
Attacks.Effect: Add dice to this attack equal to the difference in speed attributes between this character and the target.

Superpowers.Name: Static
Superpowers.Effect: If this character is targeted by a melee attack, the attacker gains the Stun special condition.

Attacks.Name: Iron Tail
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Stagger special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Raichu character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
